heaviest_rainfall.status: The largest amount of rain ever recorded is on 09 November 2025 when 47.89mm fell at a maximum rate of 24.6mm per hour over the 144.8 hour event.

heaviest_rainrate.status: On 02 September 2025, the rain fell at an exceptional rate, peaking at 34.3mm per hour, the heaviest downpour recorded.  A total of 21.19mm fell over the 15.0 hour storm.

longest_rain.status: The lengthiest precipitation event recorded spanned 144.8 hours on 09 November 2025, it was characterized by a peak rain intensity of 24.6mm per hour and a total rainfall of 47.89mm.

most_lightning.status: The most lightning activity recorded in a single day is 23, which occurred on 07 September 2025 (since our records began on 11 April 2025).

storm.status: No storms are expected.  The last storm was observed on 02 February 2026 and continued for 1 day.

top_10_dry.status: The longest dry period started on 24 April 2025 and lasted for 19 days.

top_10_rainy.status: The longest rainy period started on 13 January 2026 and lasted for 22 days.

cold_snaps.status: There is not a cold snap right now.  There have been 3 this year, compared to a usual average of 3.6.

extreme.status: The record temperature difference stands at 26.7°C (0.4 - 27.1°C), set on 29 April 2025.

heatwaves.status: There is not a heatwaves right now.  There have been 0 this year, compared to a usual average of 1.9.

tropical.status: The last tropical night was on 18 July 2025 and it has only happened 62 times since 1973.

average.status: The current average daily wind direction is southerly (202°).  In the UK, a southerly wind usually brings milder, moist air from the Atlantic.

gusts.status: To date, the maximum wind gust recorded is 128.2 mph on 27 January 2026.

run.status: The record wind run remains at 1737 miles from 21 October 2012.

speed.status: The largest wind speed ever was on 13 October 2012 with a value of 93.7 mph.

top_10_windy.status: We are in the midst of one of the longest windy periods recorded.  This windy period is ranked 9th since records began in 23 September 2024.  The current stretch started on 02 February 2026 and has lasted 3 days.  The longest windy period started on 11 October 2012 and lasted for 21 days.

summary.description: Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.9°C) and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 1.1 mm).

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, the air will feel dry and very little to no wind will be present. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and periods of sunshine are expected. Changeable conditions.

washing.phrase: The current temperature is too low (6.9°C) for optimal drying conditions.  Any drying will take longer.
